archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0793
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Direct Cost Specialist - We want the interconnect cost allocated to the proper cost GL by product group and by segment at month end. Source ICT generate monthly Financial Summary, Cost allocation is manual process

properties.value: Looks like a requirement for IPB KH: agree, been handed to IPB Moved to seperate excel for IPB

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
